subject: cnc engraver
author: braker13
full_text:
Frank,

I met you at the goodwill on Broadway and Oxford about five months ago; 
I had told you that I built a CNC router in my garage.  You asked me if 
I did PCB routing and you had told me about those boxes that you make 
and the electronics you use to make them.  Well, as it turns out, I 
picked up two CNC engravers and I am looking to sell one of them.  If 
you are interested let me know.

Thank you
Silver Ortiz
